about_the_game:
Coin'N'Glory!

A Pack filled with soldiers for your armies.
This product includes:
  • Conquistador_Archer
  • Conquistador_Axeshield
  • Conquistador_Crossbow
  • Conquistador_DualPistol
  • Conquistador_DualSwords
  • Conquistador_Fusilier
  • Conquistador_Greataxe
  • Conquistador_Greatsword
  • Conquistador_Guisarme
  • Conquistador_Halberd
  • Conquistador_Lucerne
  • Conquistador_Maceshield
  • Conquistador_Maul
  • Conquistador_Pistol_Saber
  • Conquistador_SpellWarrior_Fire
  • Conquistador_SpellWarrior_Ice
  • Conquistador_SpellWarrior_Illusion
  • Conquistador_SpellWarrior_Light
  • Conquistador_SpellWarrior_Shadow
  • Conquistador_Swordshield
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

Coin'N'Glory!

A Pack filled with soldiers for your armies.
This product includes:

  • Conquistador_DualPistol

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Coin'N'Glory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
